value.title: DAX Fridays! #106: Power Query or DAX?
value.excerpt: If you already know, how about you share your thoughts here? If not, then I will share my thoughts in the topic.  There are no perfect answers, only good questions ;)  Happy Friday! Here is what we will cover: 1. Explain ISFILTERED function 2. Explain how filters move across tables  3. Explain ISCROSSFILTERED function
